* Her systems were repaired completely, and her mind coiled in the many 
different ways in which she would repay the Maximals for their�KINDNESS!
Yes, her body was still in parcel stasis but her mind reeled and conformed 
like it had never done before.
And the only bot that would escape her wrath was the very one that had shown 
any kindness in the whole lot, Rex.
BrightBlade growled in the semi-sleep, knowing that the time would come when 
the Maximals would know fear�and feel her wrath for this!*
